set(EXTERNAL_NAME oglplus)
string(TOUPPER ${EXTERNAL_NAME} EXTERNAL_NAME_UPPER)

include(ExternalProject)
ExternalProject_Add(
    ${EXTERNAL_NAME}
    URL http://github.com/matus-chochlik/oglplus/archive/develop.zip
    URL_MD5 9dfdd89122d13227ac4ef76b2094baa8
    CONFIGURE_COMMAND ""
    BUILD_COMMAND ""
    INSTALL_COMMAND ""
    LOG_DOWNLOAD 1
)

# Hide this external target (for ide users)
set_target_properties(${EXTERNAL_NAME} PROPERTIES FOLDER "hidden/externals")

ExternalProject_Get_Property(${EXTERNAL_NAME} SOURCE_DIR)

set(${EXTERNAL_NAME_UPPER}_INCLUDE_DIRS ${SOURCE_DIR}/include ${SOURCE_DIR}/implement CACHE TYPE INTERNAL)
